replies.HELP_MENU_COMMANDS_DESCRIPTION:
1. **Ping Command:**
   - Command: `/ping`
   - Description: Check the bot's ping.

2. **Set Up Command:**
   - Command: `/setup`
   - Description: Access the setup interface to configure the bot.

3. **Master Panel Command:**
   - Command: `/master-panel`
   - Description: Send the master control panel with both simple (user-friendly) and advanced (quick-actions) options. Optionally, choose a color.

4. **Personal Panel (Play) Command:**
   - Command: `/play` or `/personal-panel`
   - Description: Send a hidden personal control panel with simple (user-friendly) and advanced (quick-actions) options. Optionally, choose a color.

5. **Help Command:**
   - Command: `/help`
   - Description: Access the help command to get assistance.

6. **Settings Command:**
   - Command: `/settings`
   - Description: Access the settings embed for configuration.

7. **View Premium Command:**
   - Command: `/premium`
   - Description: View your premium active guilds & modify it.

8. **Activate Premium Command:**
   - Command: `/activate-premium`
   - Description: Activate premium in the current guild.

9. **Deactivate Premium Command:**
    - Command: `/deactivate-premium`
    - Description: Deactivate premium in the current guild.
replies.HELP_MENU_SETTINGS_DESCRIPTION:
1. **Language Setup:**
   - Navigate to the setup panel using `/setup`.
   - On the first page, set a new language.

2. **Bot Invitation:**
   - Continue to the second page in the setup.
   - Invite any missing bots needed for your server.

3. **DJ Role or Logging Channel Setup:**
   - Proceed to the third page in the setup.
   - Set a new DJ role or logging channel as required.

4. **Sending Panels:**
   - To send a controller panel, use either of the following commands:
     - `/master-panel [type]`: Sends the controller panel in the chat (Admins only command).
     - `/personal-panel [type]` or `/play [type]`: Sends the controller panel only between the sender and the bot (accessible by anyone with bot access).
replies.HELP_MENU_PREMIUM_DESCRIPTION:
Before subscribing on [Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/user?u=108222610), follow these steps for a smooth premium experience:

1. **Link Your Discord Account:**
   - Go to [Patreon Discord Settings](https://www.patreon.com/settings/apps/discord).
   - Link your Discord account to Patreon.

2. **Payment Confirmation:**
   - After making the payment, wait for a confirmation message.
   - If you don't receive a message, check your role in our Discord server.

3. **Role Check in Discord:**
   - If you don't have the premium role, visit [Patreon Discord Settings](https://www.patreon.com/settings/apps/discord).
   - Scroll to "Available servers," click "Leave Server," then "Join Server."

4. **Server Access:**
   - If you still don't have access to our server, it may indicate an incomplete payment.
   - Double-check your payment status on Patreon.

## **Facing Issues? Contact Support:**
If you encounter any issues or believe there's an error, reach out to us in our [Support Server](https://discord.gg/boogie).
